Image Hider: Simplify Your Browsing Experience

Overview: Image Hider is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension designed to help users control their visual web experience. With a simple click, you can hide any image that you don’t wish to see, making your browsing cleaner and more focused on the content that matters to you.

Features:

Hide on Demand: Right-click on any image across the web and select ‘Hide Image’ to remove it instantly from your view.
Persistent Hiding: Once an image is hidden, it remains so during your browsing session, allowing for an uninterrupted experience.
Clear Hidden Images: Easily reset your browsing view by clearing all hidden images with one click, available in the context menu for all pages.
How It Works: Image Hider integrates seamlessly into your browser. When you choose to hide an image, the extension removes it from the page and stores its URL in local storage. If you navigate away and return, the image will stay hidden. When you’re ready to clear the slate, select ‘Clear All Hidden Images’ to restore all previously hidden images.

Privacy Focused: We value your privacy. Image Hider operates entirely locally on your device, without transmitting any data externally. Your browsing habits remain your own.

Get Started: Enhance your browsing experience today with Image Hider. It’s simple, effective, and respects your digital space.
